title: Government of Alberta data exchange standard
description: JSON schema for Government of Alberta data exchange standard.

addressLine.description: A portion of an individual's mailing address which identifies a specific location within a municipality.

postalAddress.description: Address line contains the primary address number, predirectional information, street name, suffix, postdirectional information, secondary address identifier and/or secondary address.The address line can contain information for a civic, rural, or postal box address.

municipality.description: The name of a city, town, hamlet, or village.

subdivisionCode.description: A three-letter code identifying the applicable province, state, or territory.

postalCode.description: A code assigned to one or more addresses, required for the mechanized processing of mail.

country.description: The international standard two-letter country code.
